text: During #UFC249 faceoffs on Friday morning, Jacare, who has since received a positive coronavirus test, maintained a large distance between himself and opponent Uriah Hall. https://t.co/93DIuZJUxg

entity.name: UFC 249: Ferguson and Gaethje set to face off for the interim lightweight title
